294260.name: Trials Fusion Demo
294260.description: Players have access to four tracks from the single player campaign, along with the first two tutorial levels. They also have access to the Editor for track creation and to the low level rider gear.
294260.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 荷兰语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
developers: RedLynx, in collaboration with  Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Kiev
